name: CRYSTAL CARE (Jadegenius)
description:
This is an extra credits jam submission.

Game:

you work in an agency called crystal care, you need to find the crystals that can be found in a maze and take them back.

are you up for the task

Disclaimer:

play in fullscreen for the ui...

play without assist camera for nice experiance.

cassist camera activevassist camera inactive

thanks for playing my game
